planStatus.notSubscribed: You are not subscribed to any plan yet.
planStatus.yearlySubscribed: You are subscribed to the yearly plan. If you purchase a new subscription, your old subscription will be cancelled and replaced with the new subscription.
planStatus.monthlySubscribed: You are subscribed to the monthly plan. If you purchase a new subscription, your old subscription will be cancelled and replaced with the new subscription.

errors.processingError: There was an error processing your subscription. Please try again.
